column1: Leggodt94,"2008-07-07T22:17:05.2Z","Mini getaway boat! ","Yet another small and easy to build nic-nac lego model that's just so small, it's irresistable. Also includes cool clear piece, things in the back that adjust, and the model seats one minifigure for a cool model that's so versatile. ",FALSE,5,0,0,0,0

modena,"2010-11-21T09:31:57.963Z","Very good gift!","I got this little gift on a flight, 2 actually, and I was happy for the entire holiday, and still now. The value for money is inaccurate as it was included in the flight.

Pros:

  • Good colours!
  • Great detail!
  • Easy to combine!
  • Space for a minifigure!
  • Extra building idea!

Cons:

  • Not much building (doesn't really matter anyway!)
  • Could do well in a plastic box, to keep the spare pieces.

Overall:

This was a really nice set, and it gets really fun if you have two of them. There were great parts, and also some hinging parts, which makes everything more fun. In the instruction book was also another model, as an idea, and I found that one nice too. Again, if you had two of them, you can easily race!

If you find this set, I recommend you get two of them, and you will see why!

",TRUE,4,4,3,3,3

column2: This is one of the sets included in the Mr. Magorium Creator set, and is my least favorite model, though I still find it to be a nice mini model.

column3: There is actually a space for a minifigure, and it looks just right. I currently have injured dying Anakin in the boat.
The boat is very simple in design, but that doesn't mean it isn't good.
The back pieces don't really need to be there.
The boat would be a bit better if it were larger.

column2: This set's color scheme also contributes to a great set, which should be bought at a really low price.
